According to the Validation List 85, IJSEM (2002), 52, 685–690, the UNIQEM collection number of the type strain is Uniqem 210. This, however, is the type strain of Thermovenabulum ferriorganovorum Zavarzina et al. 2002. The correct number is Uniqem

Imhoff 2003 proposes to transfer the type species of the genus Pelodictyon into the genus Chlorobium. According to Rule 37a, bacteriologists adhering to this proposal must change the name Pelodictyon to Chlorobium.
